Self.Name: History-Show-RepairOrders-Table-Backup
Self.Description: Table view to show or edit multiple records.

Attribute.Name: InternalUse:ExistingRecordFormula
Attribute.Value: IF(RONo<1000000,"OEM", IF(RONo>=1000000 and RoNo<1100000,"METAL", IF(RONo>=1100000,"BIO","No Location")))
